price: (keadaan mereka) adalah seperti keadaan kaum Firʻawn  dan orang-orang yang sebelumnya; mereka mendustakan ayat-ayat Kami, karena itu Allah menyiksa mereka disebabkan dosa-dosa mereka.  Dan Allah sangat keras siksa-Nya.
arabic: كَدَأۡبِ ءَالِ فِرۡعَوۡنَ وَٱلَّذِينَ مِن قَبۡلِهِمۡۚ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا فَأَخَذَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِذُنُوبِهِمۡۗ وَٱللَّهُ شَدِيدُ ٱلۡعِقَابِ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: kadabi āli fir'ʿawna wa-alladhīna min qablihim kadhabū biāyātinā fa-akhadhahumu al-lahu bidhunūbihim wal-lahu shadīdu al-ʿiqābi
